note.p: Antique furniture and curiosity dealer. Had premises at 1 Spur Street, Leicester Square, and 14 Wardour Street, Soho, London, 1866.
Census returns of England and Wales (The National Archives: Public Record Office 107/1468/625/1), 1861 (RG9/175/5/4), 1871 (RG10/144/46/5), 1881 (RG11/130/29/19)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 5 September 2019)
